coll-book_creator_intro: <big>''Lehkhabu siamtu'' hmang hian i duh duh vuiki phêk awmna lehkhabu i siam thei ang. Lehkhabu chu format hrang hrang (entir nan PDF emaw ODF emaw)-in i export thei a, printed copy order pawh i order thei bawk.</big>
coll-book_creator_help: Chungchang belh hriat duh chuan [[{{MediaWiki:Coll-helppage}}|lehkhabu chungchang phêk]] ên la.
coll-book_creator_continue: Lehkhabu siamtu hmang chhunzawm zel tur
coll-book_creator_disable_text: ''Lehkhabu siamtu'' chu hmang theih lo a ni ang a, i lehkhabu thawh mek chu paihthlak tawh a ni ang.
coll-unknown_subpage_text: [[Special:Book|Lekhabu]] phêk të hi a sawm lo.
coll-couldnotaddarticle_title: Vuikui phêk a dah theih lo.
coll-couldnotaddarticle_msg: Vuiki phêk chu a belh thei lo.
coll-couldnotremovearticle_title: Vuiki phêk chu a paih thei lo
coll-couldnotremovearticle_msg: Vuiki phêk chu a paih thei lo.
coll-download_text: I lehkhabu hnuhthlak tur chuan format thlang la, button kha click rawh.
coll-download_as_text: I lehkhabu chu $1 format-a hnuhthlak duh chuan button kha click rawh.
coll-new_chapter: Bûng thar atan hming ziak rawh
coll-rename_chapter: Bûng atan hming thar ziak rawh
coll-notitle_title: Phêk thupui ngah thei tawh lo
coll-notitle_msg: A phêk hming chu hriat chian theih a ni lo.
coll-request_failed_title: Lehkhabu pe let thei tawh lo
coll-request_failed_msg: I lehkhabu pe let tum lai khan thi sual a awm a.
coll-save_collection_title: I lehkhabu vawngṭha tur leh intawm tur
coll-save_collection_text: I lehkhabu dah ṭhatna tur hmun thlang rawh:
coll-save_category: Lehkhabu vawngṭha tawh zawng zawng chu [[:Category:{{MediaWiki:Coll-bookscategory}}|{{MediaWiki:Coll-bookscategory}}]] bithliahnaah dah vek a ni.
coll-overwrite_title:
Phêk a awm tawh.
Ziak tam zawk duh em?
coll-overwrite_text:
[[:$1]] tih hming pu phêk pakhat chu a awm tawh.
I lehkhabu hmanga thlak i duh em?
coll-load_overwrite_text:
I lehkhabuah hian phêk engemaw zât i nei tawh a ni.
I lehkhabu ziak tawh kha he aiin tam zawk i ziak duh em, a thupui thar i dah emaw, a dah chhuah chu i duh em?
coll-limit_exceeded_text:
I lehkhabu hi a lian lutes.
Phêk dang dah belh theih a ni lo.
coll-rendering_text:
I document siam mêk lai chu khawngaihtakin lo nghâk rëng ang che.

Hmasawnna: $1% $2

He phêk chu second tlemte danah amah leh amah inṭan leh ngei ang. Hei hi a thawk lo chuan, i browser-a inṭanna button kha rawn tlan teh.
coll-create_a_book_tooltip: Lehkhabu emaw phêk chilhkhâwm emaw siamna
coll-download_as_tooltip: He wiki phêk $1 hi hnûkthla rawh
coll-add_linked_article: I lehkhabuah wiki phêk zawmsa telh rawh
coll-remove_linked_article: I lehkhabua wiki phêk zawm awm nuaibo rawh
coll-add_category: He pawl hi i lehkhabuah telh rawh
coll-add_category_tooltip: He pawla wiki phêk zawng zawng hi i lehkhabuah telh vek rawh
coll-add_this_page: He phêk hi i lehkhabuah telh rawh
coll-add_page_tooltip: Tuna i wiki phêk en mék hi i lehkhabuah telh rawh
coll-clear_collection_confirm: I lehkhabu zawng zawng i nuaibo vek duh tak tak maw?
coll-clear_collection_tooltip: Tuna i lehkhabu aţang hian wiki phêk zawng zawng nuaibo vek rawh
coll-load_collection_tooltip: He lehkhabu i hman mék angin lâwt rawh
coll-remove_this_page: He phêk hi i lehkhabu aţang pawtthla rawh
coll-remove_page_tooltip: Tuna i wiki phêk en mék hi i lehkhabu aţang pawtthla rawh
coll-show_collection_tooltip: I lehkhabu siamţha/la/chah tùrin tah hian hmet rawh
coll-not_addable: He phêk hi telh theih a ni lo
coll-make_suggestions_tooltip: I lehkhabu phêk aţanga rawtna tihlanna
